projects.title: VISA Cosmos Project (Private Repo)
projects.description: The aim of this project is to create a loyalty concierge application specifically designed for esteemed VISA Credit Card holders. This application will empower them to seamlessly book hotels, spas, flights, and more through our sophisticated software platform.

projects.title: Aspire Lifestyle Digital Demo Site (Private Repo)
projects.description: The central aim of this project is for the Aspire Lifestyle Digital department to utilize it as a showcase website, catering to their significant and prospective clientele.

projects.title: Concierge Portal Digital Site Project (Private Repo)
projects.description: Similar to the VISA COSMOS project, we have developed a loyalty concierge application that empowers the concierge team to arrange bookings for hotels, restaurants, spas, clubs, and more on behalf of their clients

projects.title: Aspire Lifestyle Site Manager Project
projects.description: I am in the process of developing a Platform as a Service (PaaS) where clients can utilize our platform to create individualized websites tailored to their business requirements. Our platform is currently being used by prominent banks such as CitiBank, JPMC, and HSBC,... as well as well-known payment networks including VISA and MasterCard.

projects.title: Bambu Coffee Management System - Freelance (Private Repo)
projects.description: Bambu Coffee is a mobile-based F&B management app for coffee shops. Staff use it to take orders and check in/out with NFC cards, while admins manage bills, timesheets, and menus through a simple backend interfaceâ€”boosting efficiency and customer experience.

projects.title: Bosch Rexroth Drive And Control Project: Online Customer Support
projects.description: Live Assist is a digital communication interface with various contact options for immediate support. It has touchpoints for customers to Rexroth, providing automatic routing to the right solution group John Doe - Page 2 of 3 or expert. Live Assist creates transparency of communication through clear reporting and is a permanent touchpoint on the website.

projects.title: Personal Project: User Story Workflow Diagram Generator
projects.description: This project is a web application that allows users to create user stories and workflows following a structured format. The application simplifies the process of generating diagrams for user stories by leveraging GPT-4o to produce PlantUML code and visual representations.

projects.title: Personal Project: DocGen
projects.description: DocGen is a web application that generates Sphinx-compatible HTML documentation from GitHub repos- itory source code. It clones a specified repository using nodegit, processes its files in parallel with worker threads to create a source code text file, chunks the content for GPT-4o analysis, and converts the resulting RST into HTML using sphinx-build. The frontend, built with Vue.js, provides a simple interface to input a GitHub repo URL and download the generated documentation.

projects.title: Personal Project: Merlin Chatbot
projects.description: This is my personal GenAI chatbot project. The goal of this project is to recreate a ChatGPT-like experience as a foundation for future initiatives. Merlin, the chatbot, leverages advanced prompting techniques to analyze documentation, utilize device geolocation (latitude and longitude) to rec- ommend restaurants, generate code (CodeGen), and support academic research activities.

projects.title: Douce - Freelance (Private Repo)
projects.description: This is an e-commerce website designed for selling perfumes. The platform features a user-friendly client interface where customers can browse, search, and purchase various perfumes. It also includes a secure admin dashboard that allows administrators to manage product listings, track orders, handle customer inquiries, and update inventory efficiently.

services.title: Product Owner
services.description: responsible for maximizing the value of the product by managing the product backlog, defining clear user stories, and ensuring alignment between business goals and development work. They collaborate closely with stakeholders and the Scrum Team to deliver high-impact, customer-focused solutions.

services.title: Senior Software Engineer
services.description: .NET Core Developer, DevOps and Automation Scripting

aboutpara: With a strong web app and mobile development background, I bring valuable expertise as a Software Developer. Additionally, I also have over 2 years of experience in Business Analysis. Recently, I obtained certifications as a Professional Scrum Master and Professional Scrum Product Owner, showcasing my commitment to professional growth. However, I firmly acknowledge that knowledge knows no bounds, whereas our human capabilities are limited. Therefore, I embrace the idea that there is always room for further development and advancement. I am passionate about expanding my proficiency in emerging technologies and continuously improving my skill set. My primary objective is to tackle any challenge that comes my way and utilize my abilities to create impactful and practical applications. I am dedicated to pushing the boundaries and striving for excellence in my work.
